Name: Complete Purchase Flow with Customization and Checkout
Description: Navigate to the homepage, add a cellphone to the cart, customize options, and proceed through the checkout process by filling in personal and shipping information before completing the order.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button addToCart
Step 3: Click on button IncreaseQuantity
Step 4: Click on label colorStorageOption (256GB)
Step 5: Click on label colorStorageOption (ColorSelection)
Step 6: Click on button Buy
Step 7: Click on link goToCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 8: Click on button Increased
Step 9: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 10: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 11: Click on input Email
Step 12: Enter input value in input Email
Step 13: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 14: Hover over div CheckoutPage
Step 15: Click on input FirstName
Step 16: Click on input FirstName
Step 17: Hover over div CheckoutPage2
Step 18: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 19: Click on input LastName
Step 20: Hover over div CheckoutPage3
Step 21: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 22: Click on input Address
Step 23: Hover over div CheckoutPage4
Step 24: Enter input value in input Address
Step 25: Click on input ZipCode
Step 26: Hover over div CheckoutPage5
Step 27: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 28: Click on input City
Step 29: Hover over div CheckoutPage6
Step 30: Enter input value in input City
Step 31: Click on input State
Step 32: Hover over div CheckoutPage7
Step 33: Enter input value in input State
Step 34: Click on input Phone
Step 35: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 36: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 37: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/{*}'
Step 38: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Complete Purchase of New Mobile Phone from Mobile Brands
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select a mobile brand, choose a new phone, and complete the checkout process. Verify the thank you page after order completion.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link mobileBrands (Apple) -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 4: Click on button newMobilePhone (NewIPhone15Plus)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOption (Storage256GB)
Step 6: Click on label storageColorOption (ColorGreen)
Step 7: Click on button purchase (Buy)
Step 8: Click on link GoToCart
Step 9: Fill out the checkout information form and proceed to payment
	- Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
	- Step 2: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
	- Step 3: Click on input Email
	- Step 4: Enter input value in input Email
	- Step 5: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
	- Step 6: Hover over div CheckoutPage
	- Step 7: Click on input FirstName
	- Step 8: Hover over div CheckoutPage2
	- Step 9: Enter input value in input FirstName
	- Step 10: Click on input LastName
	- Step 11: Hover over div CheckoutPage3
	- Step 12: Enter input value in input LastName
	- Step 13: Click on input Address
	- Step 14: Hover over div CheckoutPage4
	- Step 15: Enter input value in input Address
	- Step 16: Click on input ZipCode
	- Step 17: Hover over div CheckoutPage5
	- Step 18: Enter input value in input ZipCode
	- Step 19: Click on input City
	- Step 20: Hover over div CheckoutPage6
	- Step 21: Enter input value in input City
	- Step 22: Click on input State
	- Step 23: Hover over div CheckoutPage7
	- Step 24: Enter input value in input State
	- Step 25: Click on input Phone
	- Step 26: Enter input value in input Phone
	- Step 27: Click on button ContinueToPayment
Step 10: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/{*}'
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Add Mobile Phone to Cart and Complete Checkout Process

Step 6: Click on span dynamicObject (Link1) -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 7: Click on div PriceQtyTotal
Step 8: Click on div PriceQtyTotal

	- Step 9: Enter input value in input FirstName

	- Step 11: Hover over div CheckoutPage3
	- Step 12: Enter input value in input LastName

	- Step 14: Hover over div CheckoutPage4
	- Step 15: Enter input value in input Address
	- Step 16: Click on input ZipCode
	- Step 17: Hover over div CheckoutPage5
	- Step 18: Enter input value in input ZipCode
	- Step 19: Click on input City
	- Step 20: Hover over div CheckoutPage6
	- Step 21: Enter input value in input City
	- Step 22: Click on input State
	- Step 23: Hover over div CheckoutPage7
	- Step 24: Enter input value in input State
	- Step 25: Click on input Phone
